name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log

ip.title: IP address of the MiniSafe2 in your local network.

password.title: The password to access the MiniSafe2
password.description: Can be left empty if an access token is used

accessToken.title: The access token to access the MiniSafe2
accessToken.description: Only required if no password is used.

queryLoopDelay.title: The delay in seconds to wait between two state queries.
queryLoopDelay.description: The states of all your devices have to be polled regularly. Doing this without a delay might downgrade the performance of the MiniSafe2. If you set the delay too high, HomeKit updates will be slow.
